This app will track location in the background for a teaching activity. Your identity will not be recorded and all data will be password protected.

The location data will be used to simulate disease dynamics, which advanced students will analyze and model. They will present their findings and explain the models to the early year undergrads who provide the data. This peer learning exercise is designed to increase your understanding of quantitative methods.

If you wish to participate: Please select 'Always allow' in Location permissions to allow the app to run in the background.

1. Click 'Set location permissions'.
 2. Go to:
 Permissions>Location>Allow all the time
 3. Then cick 'I agree, start tracking'.
PeerLearn will indicate that it is tracking location
Visit our site for more details about this project
